It is characterized by its unique foliage, featuring broad, flat leaves that are often covered in a fine, waxy coating. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pale yellow or greenish in color, which bloom during the warmer months. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often found in dense undergrowth of tropical or subtropical forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
